attributes.action: Help get Rage Against the Machine xmas number 1 2009
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are all fed up of Simon Cowell and The X Factor taking away the fun of the xmas number one, we would like you and your collegues to download Rage Against The Machine - Killing in the Name for this years number one xmas single.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
